description: A powerful VS Code extension for enhancing C/C++ development with clangd.
command.newSourcePair.title: New C/C++ Header/Source Pair
command.switchHeaderSource.title: Switch Between Header/Source
command.configureRules.title: Configure C++ File Extension Rules
command.configureHeaderGuard.title: Configure Header Guard Style
command.openClangFormatEditor.title: Open Clang-Format Visual Editor
config.pairingRules.title: File Extension Pairing Rules
config.pairingRules.description: Custom rules for pairing header and source file extensions. Each rule maps header extensions to source extensions.
config.headerGuard.title: Header Guard
config.headerGuard.description: Header guard configuration for C/C++ header files.
config.headerGuard.style.title: Header Guard Style
config.headerGuard.style.description: The style of header guard to use in new header files.
config.headerGuard.format.title: Header Guard Format
config.headerGuard.format.description: The format string for generating header guard names. Available placeholders: {FILE_NAME}, {FILE_NAME_UPPER}, {FILE_PATH}, {PROJECT_NAME}
config.clangFormat.title: Clang-Format
